content: In the Harry Potter series, what is the name of the magical sport played on broomsticks that involves four balls and six players per team?

In the Harry Potter series, the magical sport played on broomsticks that involves four balls and six players per team is called Quidditch. It's a popular game in the wizarding world, and Harry Potter becomes the Seeker for Gryffindor's Quidditch team during his first year at Hogwarts.
